ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are grateful to the Department of Chemistry and Department of Agricultural Engineering of the Federal University of Viçosa (Brazil) for support and research facilities. The authors would like to thank the Brazilian Agencies: Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de Minas Gerais (FAPEMIG), Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico (CNPq). Also, this study was financed in part by the Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior—Brazil (CAPES)—Finance Code 001.
